name: Pavlov VR
description: Pavlov is a multiplayer shooter for the HTC Vive.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: Intel Quad Core 3 Ghz + Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: Intel Quad Core 3 Ghz + Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 ti or GTX 1070 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
